website_summaries.verdict: The AirRam doesn't perform well enough or offer enough cleaning options to justify its price.
pros: The Gtech AirRam is lightweight, easy to use, and highly maneuverable
Cordless operation makes it extremely convenient, and a data feature provides some semi-interesting usage information
cons: It consistently underperformed almost every other vacuum we tested

customer_reviews.title: Makes vacuuming light and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very efficient cordless vacuum cleaner. We have about 1500 square feet of hardwood floor downstairs and got tired of hauling the Dyson downstairs as it seemed like overkill for hardwood. So took a chance on this thing. It's everything we hoped it would be - good battery life (~40-50 minutes of vacuuming per charge), lightweight, highly maneuverable, powerful enough suction for the application, easy to empty. But... very expensive and I must admit the reports here of poor customer service make me nervous. If it craps out after a few months I'll update and knock off a few stars, but for the first two months it's working out well.
customer_reviews.author: inside the granfalloon

customer_reviews.title: Can't get replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving the vacuum 1 star because you can't get a replacement battery. I've called the company several times. Each time was told a battery wasn't available. Shame because its a good strong vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: As for cleaning it does a very good job, at least as good as a highly ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but nothing is perfect--the lid that covers the dust bin is not secured nearly tightly (it should lock in) enough and it tends to pop off --not often and no big deal. As for cleaning it does a very good job, at least as good as a highly rated vacuum I replaced. And it is so much more convenient--no cords and relatively light weight. And it holds a charge better than expected. I have used it 6 times and not had to recharge it. Overall it is very good.
customer_reviews.author: antman

customer_reviews.title: Had for 6 Mos. So Far, So good / Dead After 5 Years
customer_reviews.text: Mostly lives up to it's promise. I vacuum frequently now that I have this light weigh gem. Easy to carry up and down stairs. Now if I could just find a good hand vac for the stairs themselves. :-) Added 2019_08_06: Unfortunately my GTech died after 5+ years of excellent service. Vacuumed up a bent paper clip, motor went out and there is no replacement part available for repair. So sad such a nice vacuum can't handle a paper clip. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Alphasiderius

customer_reviews.title: BEST VACUUM EVER!
customer_reviews.text: With back issues, my surgeon hubby, purchased this for me two years ago. Best vacuum ever. Have a Oreck which does not pick up like the Gtech AirRam. The charge lasts longer than the 40 minutes stated. With the Gtech glide, this makes my vacuuming easy without the back pain. Purchased another for my son in Zurich, Switzerland. Package was delivered to my California address, I then remailed to Zurich. My sons wife is also in love with the Gtech AirRam. After one vacuum with the Gtech, you will see what was hiding deep in your carpets, great on my hardwood and tile. Also, ordered the handheld last year, better than our ORECK get into every nook and cranny.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi USA

customer_reviews.title: Really great second vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Have to say I have really liked this vacuum. I have one in the office and one at home. So easy to grab and just get those messes here and there. If you have kids or pets it's a must! The cordless feature has won me over!
customer_reviews.author: Joe joe

customer_reviews.title: Fur City Townhome revived by AirRam!
customer_reviews.text: WOW. I have a 120lb long haired dog + a rag doll cat. My house is fur city!! This vac is brilliant, copes with it all, awesome suction + at 7lbs I have no trouble going up + down my 3 story town home. In fact i now enjoy doing so. Thank you G-Tech you completely rock. Oh + I had a dyson before this beat's it on all levels. T.
customer_reviews.author: tsrowden

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR CAT FUR!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I have two longhaired cats who are forever shedding on their favorite rug. No more putting off vacuuming - 2 minutes and the rug is spotless - and no cord to have to wind up!
customer_reviews.author: Chapelapple

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We have laminate, tile, and carpet floors in our home and this product does a good job on all of them. It takes a little more effort on the carpet but it does a good cleaning job. It does hold a charge very well, stores easily, and is more condusive to take it out and clean a problem since it is cordless. The dirt tray is not quite as advertised but I have had no problem with it. The only thing that would make it better would be a way to add some attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen P.

customer_reviews.title: ... of these to see if it actually was as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these to see if it actually was as good as advertised. Well, I went back and purchased a second one. The Gtech is awesome. Everything that was said about how it functioned was true. It is a good product and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful. Attractive design. Easy to clean. Not obnoxiously loud. Great for sucking up fur and cat litter out of carpet. I wish it was easier to use on edges along walls. I love that it is wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, no cord
customer_reviews.text: Great suction, long battery power, love it..if there is anything to complain about...it's a little loud...but worth it
customer_reviews.author: sandy randolph

customer_reviews.title: Happy now!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it stopped dead after one year. Battery charged, roller rolls freely, lint filter clean. Phone number in owner's manual does not ring; just busy signal. G-tech replied to e-mail with correct phone number and are sending new unit.
customer_reviews.author: A J W

customer_reviews.title: Gtech makes a great vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: We love this vacuum. Not the first Gtech we’ve owned
customer_reviews.author: Sally Jardon

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product. Much easier to use then my Dyson. I still think Dyson picks up more but This is a great vacuum, I use it all the time and use the heavier Dyson for deeper cleaning. I am so happy not to be tripping over a cord.
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Quality product...
customer_reviews.text: Light, powerful...seems well-built...battery life good...would recommend this to my friends...we have a Lab who sheds 24/7 and this works great to pick up after him...
customer_reviews.author: Frank Hermes

customer_reviews.title: Great light-weight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great light-weight vacuum. I don't like the way the filters smell after one use so I will purchase a spare set. Other than that, I'm extremely happy!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing suction power for such a wonderfully light weight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Amazing suction power for such a wonderfully light weight vacuum. I highly recommend it to anyone. Very easy to carry all around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Meridith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum cleaner. It is so nice not to have to worry with a cord.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon New

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made! I vacuum daily over mostly hard floors and a few large area rugs. This has made my life so much easier! It picks up great, easy to empty, easy and quick to charge, and the charge lasts a long time for as hard as this little machine is working!
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Girl

customer_reviews.title: BEST VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: GREAT VACUUM WORKS VERY WELL LIGHTWEIGHT AND ALWAYS READY TO GO
customer_reviews.author: CHEETAHS RULE

customer_reviews.title: I like the cordless feature a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like the cordless feature a lot. The vacuum works well, picks up everything. But two filter pads which need to be washed weekly are difficult to fit back in afterwards. I spend a little time fiddling around with that.
customer_reviews.author: Giddy Up

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suction, gets the dirt next to the baseboards. A bit pricey
customer_reviews.author: donna shenkel

customer_reviews.title: Gtech stick vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is defininetly a little noisier than most, but other than that it is the best stick vacuum out there, bigger and more powerful but still very light weight. You have all the advantages of a convenient stick vacuum along with the power and capacity of a regular vacuum. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Miya Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact it is lightweight and cordless
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact it is lightweight and cordless. Battery lasts long enough for the job. I use it to vacuum inside floors, carpet and outside patio. Very convenient. Also - great customer service and follow-up. Have purchased 2 others for family.
customer_reviews.author: vivienne Cummings

customer_reviews.title: great cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: great cordless vacuum. Not as powerful as our main vacuums, but more powerful than we expected. We use it for our in between vacuuming or spot cleaning. We havent had any issue with battery life or cleaning power.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Uchytil

customer_reviews.title: pretty good for light stuff
customer_reviews.text: pretty good for light stuff, cleans off wood floors pretty well too. It picks up stuff well off all surfaces I have tried. 5 stars except emptying the unit is very frequent, to often, and it is messy messy messy.
customer_reviews.author: Pinehurst Bad Bad 10

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS VACUUM!!!! It actually fluffs my carpet. It's so light and not having a cord is just the icing on the cake! AWESOME and totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Good maneuverability, keeps charge wonderfully, size is great, (fits around toilet bowls) good power - would have liked a slimmer nose to get under cabinet edges sideways. Love not having a cord, overall very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. Light weight. Easy to move around corners. Super easy to clean & empty.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing vacuum yet
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing vacuum yet! Easy to use, relatively quiet, great performance. Only issue is the short life of the battery. Good news, that just makes you get your butt in gear and get it done!
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Great little cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This little cleaner is a dream. It can even handle the cat hair that is everywhere. It's as easy as a dust mop to use but a lot better. I so love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: my wife says it is awesome and can't believe it doesn't have a cord, but the dogs leave when it is being used.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum cleaner is wonderful. Very light to carry around the house (downstairs ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum cleaner is wonderful. Very light to carry around the house (downstairs and upstairs) and it is powerfull. I love using it.
customer_reviews.author: Miroslava Zivnustka

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum of the Future No Doubt
customer_reviews.text: We've had the vacuum for about a month, and we found that we get much more time on a battery charge than we expected. It is not as quiet as expected, but we were probably expecting too much. It is light and easily portable, and it gets into tight spaces well. Emptying accumulated dirt is very simple, but it should be done over a large container, probably outdoors. Minus one star for the high price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob W.

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am extremely pleased. It is so easy to use. As it is cordless & lightweight, it is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Gough

customer_reviews.title: buying a 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: Great machine so far (used 3 times so far). My plan is to give my new renters this machine to keep the new carpet clean. RSS
customer_reviews.author: Robert Swinney

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! I own a cordless Dyson and prefer the Gtech vac. Battery life is literally 5 times longer. It is a bit heavier but more practical.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as I ordered this was for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Kirby

customer_reviews.title: They back up their product
customer_reviews.text: Not only does it do a good job of sweeping up the massive hairballs from my two very large white shepherds, recently one of the rear wheels came off. When I emailed customer support on how to put the wheel back on (it wouldn't stay on because I was missing a screw), they told ne they would just send a new vacuum and I could keep the original vacuums battery to boot! Wish more companies dealt with issues as well as they have!
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and cordless
customer_reviews.text: It's light and easy to maneuver, does a good job on carpets and hard surfaces. Easy to empty. BUT very loud and noisy. I know that with a bit of engineering it could be quiet. I would buy the "Stealth AirRam" in a minute
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not as good as my old vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that this would replace my old vacuum, but I was very disappointed. My neighbor's stick cleaned just as well. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice so far
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Gtech cordless but so far I love it. Really easy to set up. It came with a bit of a charge so I could "charged" around the house and check it out. It picked up cat hair, dust, kitty litter, and all. After fully charged it easily lasts for what I need it. I was considering buying one with a hose an wand to get tight places but this has enough suction that it gets corners and under chairs and beds pretty easily. I bought this for my sister but now considering buying one for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cheetah

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best vacuum cleaner. Easy to operate and to clean. Does good job. I use it instead of broom for every small or big mess in the kitchen, and the mess made by my 2 cats.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAficionado

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful cordless vacuum. I have had a couple in the past, but nothing to compare to the power as this one. One charge lasts 40 minutes and it is powerful the entire time. My husband wasn't a fan of cordless until now. He uses it every day and can't believe how it gets up all the fur from our 2 dogs and 1 cat. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: The best one!!!
customer_reviews.text: I completely love it, its so light and the battery really last long enough to do my whole house. I am in love with this machine. And no bags what is great to save money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Great vaccuum
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is wonderful. The pickup is wonderful. It's lightweight and can be taken upstairs with ease. The dirt collection tray is easy to clean. I highly recommend this product. The only possible negative thing is there Re no attachments, but the positive factors outweigh the negative factors in this case,
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: It was great in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: It was great in the beginning. I did not like the filters and cleaning them was really disgusting. The dirt stayed in the well and had to turn it upside down to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: cbs

customer_reviews.title: Love my Gtech vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love my Gtech vacuum cleaner. I bought it for the upstairs so I wouldn't have to lug the other one upstairs, but now I run it down and do the whole downstairs then put it back in the closet. It's sooo light and easy. It holds a charge really well and does an amazing job.
customer_reviews.author: Green cook

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for one small problem (that isn't so small)
customer_reviews.text: I've had an early model of this vacuum for several years. It's very, very good, but I have one gripe--unless later models have fixed this problem. The brush is next to impossible to remove, so hair that gets wound around it has to be laboriously cut out. I have long hair, and this has become such a disadvantage that I'm in the market for a new vacuum. If you buy this vac, I'd suggest getting a second battery. I've appreciated the ability to pop one battery out, insert another, and keep going. The customer service people aren't very helpful if you have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Anne L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does an excellent job on carpets as well as hardwood floors. The battery lasts quite a long time. I really enjoy vacuuming without a cord getting in the way. Even the little ones can operate it with ease. Very easy to maneuver around objects like tables and chair legs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Graduate Student

customer_reviews.title: Best Rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several rechargeable vacuums. This one works and has a great suction. A bit noisy, but worth that in efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Bosso

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love It !!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this vacuum about a month now and what a wonderful unit it is! It absolutely does everything they say it will. It is so very easy to use and keep charged. It is always in standby mode ready to go. The company is great also. THEY REALLY CARE about customer satisfaction. (what a novel idea these days..) Thanks Gtech for everything....WE LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: CGIII

customer_reviews.title: Cordless vacs have come a long way. This is ...
customer_reviews.text: Cordless vacs have come a long way. This is a fast way to clean the main areas of the house. The charge lasts an hour. There are no attachments for this model so I still use the canister vacuum when I need to do the edges/crannies.
customer_reviews.author: Careful Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Best cordless vacuum. Use this commercially, and it has been the best. We have 3 different vacuums and this is the first choice.
customer_reviews.author: Shqip

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine that there is a better cordless vacuum manufactured. This is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Vacuum. Battery lasts 40 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Vacuum. Battery lasts 40 minutes. Very powerful and easy to empty. A little pricey but you really do get what you pay for in this instance.
customer_reviews.author: Bill P.

customer_reviews.title: Gtech AirRam Cordless Vacuum from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It is light weight and always ready. We use it for quick pick ups. We purchased it from Amazon and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!! Would and have recommended it to friends. Easy to operate and the power is great. I am a clean freak, so when I say it is good, it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: U will love it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vac. We have two ragdolls cats and have tile and hardwood floors. Does a fabulous job and holds the charge quite a long time. Have recommend to several of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: hydee

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I read all reviews on other vacs and was amazed. Very glad I got this one,costs a little more but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: carol l cook

customer_reviews.title: GTECH AIRRAM HIGH-POWER CORDLESS VACUUM CLEANER
customer_reviews.text: ONE VERY GOOD VACUUM CLEANER EASY TO OPERATE AND LIGHT WEIGHT NO CORDS TO DRAG ALL OVER HOUSE
customer_reviews.author: david s t saucedo  David T. Saucedo

customer_reviews.title: I was really surprised at how light and efficient this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at how light and efficient this is. I am not getting rid of my other vacuum, but this will be my primary tool.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie and Scott

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much bought another for our summer house!
customer_reviews.author: treetops

customer_reviews.title: It is a powerful vacuum cleaner and very easy to clean unlike similar vacuum cleaner I've tried before
customer_reviews.text: It met my expectation. It is a powerful vacuum cleaner and very easy to clean unlike similar vacuum cleaner I've tried before.
customer_reviews.author: Strmis

customer_reviews.title: High quality efficient product.
customer_reviews.text: Very light and navigates into areas where larger, heavier units cause difficulty. The unit also holds its charge for a very long time. Quite easy to clean and it does an excellent job of picking up hair from our ever-shedding Siamese cat.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rossini

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best vac I've ever owned. Sucked up years of embedded cat hair from both Berber and plush carpet. Smooth transition to hardwood and tile. Very lightweight and easy to use. My only issue would be handle design. Cleaned rings around my heavy-duty Hoover upright. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: No One's Business

customer_reviews.title: great cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be everything I had hoped it would be. It is easy to assemble, easy to use and really works well. I was surprised at how much it picked up the first time I used it! The only surprise was it is very VERY loud! However, considering it's cordless and easy to use I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Akitalady

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Yet
customer_reviews.text: I love this lightweight rechargeable vacuum. It runs for a long time on one charge. My downstairs is approx. 2500 sq. ft. and I did the whole thing on only one charge. I did have to empty the receptacle twice because it's not very large. It would be great if they could design this with attachments somehow. One downfall is that it's difficult to get under the cabinets in the kitchen. I use this weekly and if I need attachments for crevices etc. I use my other clunky, heavy vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: V. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Stays charged !
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for a quick vacuum to use daily that would last longer than 10 minutes as I have 3 dogs and 5 people living at home. After studying about this product for quite a while I decided to take a chance when I saw it on Amazon. Took it out of the box put it together and tried it out right away. Awesome! A little noisier than some but it actually will do the whole house and still have power for a couple of days before recharging. Would and have recommended it to friends already.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Hansmann

customer_reviews.title: Great small vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We have had several Shark vacs as well as other small vacumm cleaners. The GTECH looks like it's going to beat them all out.
customer_reviews.author: Riviera Imaging

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We have a rather large home with several big name vacuums, this is by far the best cordless in our collection. Strong pull, good suction and has a very simple design. Looks great and works great. I rate 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Brock Films

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum picks up pet hair, and everything else, better than my Dyson. Excelllent vacuum, I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Zanobelli

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rather expensive for a machine that good on carpet and practically useless on hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Herman Thorbecke

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum yet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and son-in-law. They have a big house and when vacuuming, had to keep changing sockets as cord on vacuum would not reach around the house. Gtech AirRam is the best thing since sliced bread. Much better than the Dyson cordless. I have had both. Can't tell you how easy it is and both my daughter and son-in-law are impressed. Vacuums carpets and hard floors thoroughly and easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Gtech AirRam Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum eliminates all my irritations with my old vacuum cleaner. It is light. It is easy to charge using a power cord. There is no cord to trip over, and no bag to empty just a couple of bricks. Some reviewers found it noisy, but that didn't bother me. I had a little trouble putting it together after emptying it the first time, but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Painter6

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use & picks up dirt & especially pet hair very well. Without tools, it doesn't completely replace my old vacuum but it's good for most floor cleaning. It's so light weight that it works well on steps, a chore I hate. I am please with it & recommend especially for smaller size spaces like dorm rooms or small apartments. I use it in my two story house with basement. It lives up to its advertising.
customer_reviews.author: D. Conley

customer_reviews.title: The Best Vacuum Ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple the Gtech Air Ram buy it you'll love it!!!! Downside it is noisy. But that does not take away from the every thing else that is right!!!
customer_reviews.author: South Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Problem w/ Vac Clean
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to push or pull. Both wife & I are 75. Maybe usable for young person. Cleaned very well.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Demshar

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to it's cordless, lightweight design, and the fact that it can hold a charge for more than 10 minutes unlike our old Hoover Linx, it's mad easy to use. And thanks to it being mad easy to use, vacuuming ain't so much of a chore anymore. And thanks to that, we tend to vacuum a lot more often -- our house ain't been this clean in a long time. Awesome product. Can't wait to see what Gtech's gonna churn out next.
customer_reviews.author: Doctah Wahwee

customer_reviews.title: I would love to say we loved it but when I turned ...
customer_reviews.text: I would love to say we loved it but when I turned it on, it sounds like a jet engine. My wife and cats went running. I just couldn't keep it. Otherwise, very easy set-up. Works as advertised but I had not idea it was so loud.
customer_reviews.author: danray

product_meta.title: Gtech AirRam High-power Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, Graphite
product_meta.description: Gtech AirRam - Enhanced high performance pet vacuum. Suitable for all domestic pets, the delivers mains vacuum performance without the cord*, while withstanding the extra strain pet hair can place on a vacuum cleaner - clogging the mechanism and making it wear out faster. Tougher Removing pet hair from your carpet can be a real nightmare. specially designed to lift troublesome embedded pet hair from your carpets with ease. It also minimises the amount of hair that gets wrapped around the brush-bar, so less cleaning for you. Stronger The is strengthened by zinc alloy components to resist the wear and tear caused by even the toughest cleaning environments, time and time again. Sweeter Pet odours can cling to the inside of traditional vacuum cleaners, spreading unpleasant smells around your home as you clean. The AirRam K9 has refillable floral scented filters to leave rooms smelling clean and fresh. If anything goes wrong with your AirRam over the next two years, as a result of faulty manufacturing, we wil fix it or replace it Gtech AirRam - Enhanced high performance cordless pet vacuum Run-time 40 minutes Power 22V Weight 3.8kg All floor types Yes - Rugged for tough cleaning Pet hair Yes - Upgraded brush bar Ultra-low profile Yes 28 degree steering Yes Life time washable filters Yes - Fragrance enhancement 4-stage LED charge indictors Yes Battery type Lithium-ion Charging time 4 hours
feature_bullets: Clean the average home on one 4 hour charge with up to 40 minutes of run time with 22V Lithium-ion technology.
High performance and versatile cleaning on carpet, hard floors and tiled floors and it weighs only 7.7 pounds.
Powerful rotating brush bars make it ideal for pet hair.
The AirRam is bag-less with lifetime washable filters. No expensive replacements required.
The innovative Gtech AirRam will change the way you vacuum your home forever, making cleaning faster, easier and more convenient.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars270 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: The airram and all components, battery included, are covered by a 2-year warranty. We ask that you register the airram via our website within 90 days of the original date of purchase.
